Horror.title: Horror Short Film 'Cheerbleeders' | ALTER
Horror.description: Penny and Devon, a pair of high school outcasts, are best friends in their isolation in the small town of Blackfoot, Idaho.

Horror.title: Red Handed - Crime Comedy Short Film (2016)
Horror.description: Tony is a fat guy who is inspired by trekking in the woods, but suddenly he caught a random guy red-handed.

Comedy.title: Red Handed - Crime Comedy Short Film (2016)
Comedy.description: Tony is a fat guy who is inspired by trekking in the woods, but suddenly he caught a random guy red-handed.

Adventure.title: CHIKUZO 2019 | ADVENTURE ACTION SHORT FILM
Adventure.description: Kanuki Jungle, September 1907, adventurer Liam LIoyd Powell finally gets the reward for many years of hard work. He has just discovered one of the keys to find Chikuzo's hidden treasure.

Documentary.title: Kinabuhi - Award Winning Documentary Short Film
Documentary.description: Kinabuhi is our Award Winning Documentary about Filipino Coconut Farmers struggling to survive a Way-of-Life exploited by industrial agriculture and crippled by disasters like Typhoon Haiyan.
